biotools.summary: Predicting Hemolytic Activity with Integrated Feature Learning A neural network that perdict hemolytic activity classification of a peptide sequence along with inforamtion of N/C terminal modifications.This network captures context of amino acid with SeqVec embedding, Circular Fingerprint repersatation of N/C terminal modification's SMILES.
